title: Do You Know The World History ?

content.question: What scandal forced U.S. President Richard Nixon to resign in 1974?
Who was the first female prime minister of Britain?
The Cuban Revolution led to the rise of what dictator?
Along with Hiroshima, Japan, which Japanese city was hit by an atomic bomb in 1945?
Who assassinated Abraham Lincoln?
Adolf Hitler was the leader of which party?
Which continent was devastated by the Black Death in the 1300s?
A governess cares for a group of children in the early days of WWII.
A good girl and a bad boy fall for each other over the summer, but things get complicated when school starts.
Elphaba is totally a victim of circumstances and wasn't always so mean.
It's Jets vs.Sharks as a pair of star - crossed lovers struggle to be together in 1950 s NYC.
A group of struggling artists try to keep the bills paid in New York's East Village at the dawn of the 90s.
A teen girl fights segregation while showing the world (or at least Baltimore) her far-out dancing skills.
A wrongly-convicted barber takes revenge by murdering his customers.
answers: "A Gentleman's Guide to Love and Murder"

title: How Well Do You Know "The Big Lebowski" ?

content.question: What Bob Dylan song plays during the film's opening credits?

Who is the "known pornographer" to whom Bunny Lebowski owes money?

All roads lead to the capital of Italy. Do you know it?

The Great Pyramid of Giza is the only Wonder of the Ancient World still standing. It can be seen from what capital city of Egypt?
